📥 Download Videos from the Sora Website 📥

🎥 If you can play the video, you can download it! Follow these simple steps:
1️⃣ Click the "Download" icon to open a new video window.
2️⃣ Tap the "three dots" button in the lower-right corner of the video.
3️⃣ Select "Download" from the pop-up menu.

📂 Can't find your downloaded file? Check here: 👉 chrome://downloads/

🎉 Happy downloading! 🚀✨
